title: Fr Thomas Nelson: Consecrated Life: A Closer Following of Christ
description:
Fr. Thomas Nelson - The Consecrated Life: A Closer Following of Christ

A powerful reflection from Fr. Thomas Nelson, O.Praem, on how the vows of poverty, chastity and obedience lead to spiritual intimacy with Our Lord.

Filetype: MP3
Total Length: 37:07
